title: Irish Minister welcomes India's "thematic focus" on AI being an all
description: Ireland's Minister for Public Expenditure, Jack Chambers, on Monday lauded India's approach to Artificial Intelligence (AI), welcoming its emphasis on inclusivity and its vision of using AI as a force for good.
content:
New Delhi [India], February 16 (ANI): Ireland's Minister for Public Expenditure, Jack Chambers, on Monday praised India's approach to Artificial Intelligence (AI), welcoming its emphasis on inclusivity and its vision of using AI as a force for good.

title: AI minister seeks new investments in Germany, Saudi Arabia, India
description: OTTAWA — Artificial Intelligence Minister Evan Solomon is on his way to Saudi Arabia and India following a visit to Germany. He says the visits are about broadening trade alliances and obtaining investment in Canadian infrastructure and technology.
content:
OTTAWA — Artificial Intelligence Minister Evan Solomon is on his way to Saudi Arabia and India following a visit to Germany.
He says the visits are about broadening trade alliances and obtaining investment in Canadian infrastructure and technology.

title: 3 Sutras, 7 Chakras anchor India AI Impact Summit 2026 as global, tech leaders gather at Bharat Mandapam
description: Anchored on three foundational pillars, or 'Sutras'--People, Planet, and Progress--and structured around seven thematic 'Chakras', the Summit is aimed at fostering inclusive, development-orientated, and responsible artificial intelligence (AI) while strengthening international cooperation.
content:
New Delhi [India], February 16 (ANI): The India AI Impact Summit 2026 commenced on Monday at Bharat Mandapam in the national capital, marking the first global AI gathering hosted in the Global South.

title: At mega AI Summit in Delhi, Goa seeks deeptech, semiconductor investments
description: Banking on the Centre's ambitious India AI Mission unveiled alongside a major industry summit in New Delhi, Goa is positioning itself as an emerging hub for artificial intelligence, deep-tech research and semiconductor-linked sectors, a state minister said on Monday.
content:

title: Panjab University to play vital role in shaping future tech leadership: UN envoy
description: Delivering the live online lecture under the PU Colloquium series, United Nations Secretary-General’s Envoy on Technology, Dr Amandeep Singh Gill said institutions like PU can play a significant role in technology development by combining domain expertise with artificial intelligence.
content: Future leaders from PU, he said, can integrate legal, scientific and social science knowledge with AI applications to build solutions relevant for national development. He cited emerging PU start-ups that bridge law, intellectual property and AI as e... [981 chars]

title: IBM Plans to Triple Entry-Level Hiring, Even for AI-Exposed Roles
description: Tech giant IBM (IBM) is taking a different approach to artificial intelligence than many of its peers. Instead of reducing hiring for roles that...
content: Tech giant IBM (IBM) is taking a different approach to artificial intelligence than many of its peers. Instead of reducing hiring for roles that AI is expected to automate, the company plans to triple entry-level hiring in the U.S. in 2026. Speaking ... [1892 chars]

title: Maharashtra Launches India's First Industry-Oriented AI Living Lab With Germany Collaboration
description: Maharashtra has launched India’s first industry-oriented AI Living Lab at the Ratan Tata Skill University to support large industries and MSMEs with applied artificial intelligence solutions. The initiative, developed with German collaboration, aims to promote innovation, skill development and real-world industrial problem-solving through partnerships between industry.
content: Mumbai: Maharashtra has launched India’s first industry-oriented “AI Living Lab,” an initiative designed to support both large industrial groups and micro, small, and medium enterprises (MSMEs) through applied artificial intelligence solutions. The f... [2454 chars]
